original_text: Gideon and the hundred men with him reached the edge of the camp at the beginning of the middle watch, just after they had changed the guard. They blew their trumpets and broke the jars that were in their hands.
korean_text: 기드온과 그와 함께 한 백 명이 이경 초에 진영 근처에 이른즉 바로 파수꾼들을 교대한 때라 그들이 나팔을 불며 손에 가졌던 항아리를 부수니라

sentences.original_text: Gideon and the hundred men with him
sentences.korean_translation: 기드온과 그와 함께 한 백 명의 사람들이

sentences.original_text: reached the edge of the camp
at the beginning of the middle watch
just after they had changed the guard
